description: Create grafic-format density cubes containing only matter inside haloes at z=0
instructions: From the simulation snapshots and group catalogues at z=0, select all particles within the virial radius of any identified halo. Generate a new grafic-format binary cube that contains the total matter overdensity contributed only by these halo particles, for each simulation model (Fiducial, RadioWeak, Quasar, RadioStrong, DMO). Output the halo-only grafic cubes in a new folder structure.
expected_output: Halo-only grafic-format density cubes for each simulation model at z=0.
